name: SkillYoungEffYoungTalk
commands: A soldier, in blue? Might you be from the Kingdom...?
Of course! You must know my of name... Skill Draqon!|Of the glorious Draqon household!
I am afraid to say I've heard of neither you nor your house...
Bah! Who might you be anyway to besmirch the great Draqons?
How rude of me, the name's Eff R. Vescence.|Younger brother of Oberon Vescence, charmed to meet you.
...|There isn't a soul in Aurelia who hasn't heard the tales of Oberon in battle...|Though I had not heard of a third brother...
I'm still inexperienced, but I will devote myself to the people.|Using any force, physical or mental, necessary to vanquish threats.
If only- No, excuse me...|But do remember my name, it will cross the lips of every Aurelian soon!
What a curious thing...|Best hope he steels his heart, lest he lose himself to the nobles' game.
